subject: Baseball
Perjury
Sports Injuries
Doping (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Federal lawyers overseeing the Roger Clemens perjury case told a judge that their mistake last month, which led to a mistrial, resulted from an inattention to detail.
snippet: Federal lawyers overseeing the Roger Clemens perjury case told a judge that their mistake last month, which led to a mistrial, resulted from an inattention to detail.
